Movie & Dining: A discount of 15% or more on dining at partner restaurants.
Rewards Rate: For every Rs. 200 spent, you will get 8 EDGE REWARD Points.
Reward Redemption: EDGE REWARD Points can be redeemed at the EDGE REWARDS Portal. 1 EDGE REWARD Point = Rs. 0.20.
Domestic Lounge Access: In every calendar quarter, you will get 2 complimentary domestic lounge access.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off on exceeding spends of Rs. 40,000 or more in the preceding year
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge is waived off on all transactions between Rs. 400 & Rs. 4,000 (max waiver capped at Rs. 400 per month)
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount (subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 500)

product_details: Unique color theme with shades of Indian Tricolor and a fourth dedicated embossing line.
8 EDGE REWARD Points on every spend of Rs. 200 with the card.
A discount of 15% at partnered restaurants.
Complimentary access to domestic lounges up to 2 times in a quarter.
Waiver of renewal fee on annual spends of Rs. 40,000 in the previous year.
1% fuel surcharge reversed for transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs. 4,000 (max waiver of Rs. 400 in a month)
